title: Build your first Chatbot using PaLM API and Angular
description: Chatbots have become increasingly popular in recent years, as they can provide a convenient and engaging way to interact with users. In this talk, you’ll learn how to build a chatbot using Google AI’s PaLM API and the latest version of the Angular Framework. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced developer, this talk will give you the skills you need to build a chatbot that can use LLM’s capabilities to generate messages and engage with users in a meaningful way.
speaker: luis-aviles
